title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women Kawaii Sweater Striped Hooded Cardigan with Pom Poms

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable little sweater!
items.body: So cozy, So adorable. During a very windy day it kept me warm. Size is true to size. I bought an L. Read more
items.author: GINETTE ROUSSEAU

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: This pink and white striped sweater is absolutely adorable and checks all the boxes for comfort, warmth, and style. The color combination is playful yet chic, making it easy to pair with jeans, leggings, or even a skirt for a cozy but put-together look. The material itself feels wonderful against the skin—it’s soft, smooth, and not scratchy in the slightest, which makes it perfect for all-day wear. I especially love that it has just the right amount of thickness to keep you warm as the seasons shift and fall temperatures start to drop, but it’s still breathable enough that you won’t feel overheated indoors. The craftsmanship really stands out on this sweater. From the neat stitching to the carefully designed stripes, the quality to detail is evident. One of the sweetest features is the set of heart-shaped buttons, which give it such a charming, whimsical touch without being over the top. The addition of the pom-poms makes it even more fun and unique—definitely not your average striped sweater. Little details like these really elevate it and make it special. For sizing reference, I normally wear a medium or large depending on the brand, and I ordered this in a medium. The fit is absolutely perfect—not too tight and not too loose—just the right amount of cozy with enough room to layer a shirt underneath if needed. I also think it’s a great value for the price. It feels like something you’d find in a boutique, but at a much more affordable cost. This is the kind of piece that will become a go-to in your wardrobe, especially as the cooler months roll in. It’s versatile enough for casual outings, cozy nights at home, or even a seasonal family photo. Overall, I couldn’t be happier with this purchase—it’s a must-have for fall and winter, and I don’t think anyone would be disappointed adding this gem to their closet! Read more
items.author: Marilyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy!!
items.body: I am absolutely loving this sweater!! It is so soft and comfortable!! The fit is perfect for me and I think this sweater is a nice stylish upgrade from a front zippered hoodie for the fall and spring seasons. The heart shaped buttons and pom pom tassels give this a playful and fun upgrade without being too childish or eccentric. This is definitely my new favorite sweater for the cool fall days and the pink color will work well for spring too. My only “complaint” would be that this only came in two colors and I would have liked more variety so I could have one for spring (pink) and one for fall ( maroon, tan…..) as I think pink is more of a spring color. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs Wide
items.body: The sweater is very soft and comfortable although it runs wide. I ordered a small (5’3”, 112 lbs.) and it is very full. It will work as a casual sweater for cooler days and will accommodate a heavier t-shirt or undergarment of your choice. The sleeves are a bit short and my t-shirt sleeve goes about an inch or more below the sweater sleeve. The pompoms are large! I will take them off..they can be simply untied so if you want to put back on you can. The buttons are cute, heart shaped, but get caught a little when using them. A few loose strings too but nothing that impacted the quality. Read more
items.author: Mary R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My pre-teen LOVED this sweater!
items.body: I was instantly impressed with the style and quality of this sweater!! If you are like me, then your daughter can be hard to please in the style department, but I am happy to report she LOVED THIS SWEATER!! It is so soft, and the details are pure perfection. The pink color is a soft understated pink which is perfect for this year's trends. The pompoms and heart buttons add so much character. I can say with certainty that this sweater will be in heavy rotation this school year. Sizing wise, I sized up for a baggy look and hopefully to give some room in case she hits a growth spurt this year. I couldn't be happier with the fit. I think she could have fit perfectly fine in her true to size option, but I am glad I ended up going with the bigger size. I would just keep in mind how you like your sweaters to fit when picking your size. If you don't mind a looser fit, I would personally go with one size up. Read more
items.author: Hannah Stansel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality - Thick and Warm Sweater
items.body: I love this sweater because it is so soft and warm and comfortable! It is made from a heavyweight knit fabric. I really like the pink and cream color that I ordered. The pink color of the trim exactly matches the stripe pattern. That is not always the case, and I have had other tops that the trim color was slightly off. I am so happy that the colors on this sweater are and exact match. This sweater seems to be very well made, and it did not have any loose threads or visible defects. The pockets, heart shaped buttons and pom poms are a cute touch. This hooded cardigan will be a nice addition to my fall and winter wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Daryn and Lana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, warm sweater jacket for fall!
items.body: This pink and white striped sweater is so cute, warm, cozy, and stylish at the same time. The fabric is very soft, and not scratchy at all. This sweater will provide enough warm as the seasons change, and fall arrives. The craftsmanship and quality to detail is evident in this sweater, and the heart-shaped buttons are so cute. They add to the design and appeal of the sweater. A great value for the price, and a must have for your fall and winter wardrobe. You will not be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Tb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and Cozy – My Daughter Loves It!
items.body: I got this Kawaii Striped Hooded Cardigan (Pink, Medium) for my older daughter, and she absolutely loves it! It’s super cute with the pom poms and has that perfect mix of playful and cozy. The fit is great, and the material is soft and warm—perfect for layering. Definitely a fun and stylish we are ready for the fall! Read more
items.author: Gil Gorham

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
